00055 static unsigned int ir_timeout;
00056 
00057 static int nidtbl_is_sane(struct mgs_nidtbl *tbl)
00058 {
00059         struct mgs_nidtbl_target *tgt;
00060         int version = 0;
00061 
00062         LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(&tbl->mn_lock));
00063         list_for_each_entry(tgt, &tbl->mn_targets, mnt_list) {
00064                 if (!tgt->mnt_version)
00065                         continue;
00066 
00067                 if (version >= tgt->mnt_version)
00068                         return 0;
00069 
00070                 version = tgt->mnt_version;
00071         }
00072         return 1;
00073 }
00074 
00080 static int mgs_nidtbl_read(struct obd_export *exp, struct mgs_nidtbl *tbl,
00081                            struct mgs_config_res *res, struct page **pages,
00082                            int nrpages, int units_total, int unit_size)
00083 {
00084         struct mgs_nidtbl_target *tgt;
00085         struct mgs_nidtbl_entry  *entry;
00086         struct mgs_nidtbl_entry  *last_in_unit = NULL;
00087         struct mgs_target_info   *mti;
00088         __u64 version = res->mcr_offset;
00089         bool nobuf = false;
00090         void *buf = NULL;
00091         int bytes_in_unit = 0;
00092         int units_in_page = 0;
00093         int index = 0;
00094         int rc = 0;
00095         ENTRY;
00096 
00097         /* make sure unit_size is power 2 */
00098         LASSERT((unit_size & (unit_size - 1)) == 0);
00099         LASSERT(nrpages << PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT >= units_total * unit_size);
00100 
00101         mutex_lock(&tbl->mn_lock);
00102         LASSERT(nidtbl_is_sane(tbl));
00103 
00104         /* no more entries ? */
00105         if (version > tbl->mn_version) {
00106                 version = tbl->mn_version;
00107                 goto out;
00108         }
00109 
00110         /* iterate over all targets to compose a bitmap by the type of llog.
00111          * If the llog is for MDTs, llog entries for OSTs will be returned;
00112          * otherwise, it's for clients, then llog entries for both OSTs and
00113          * MDTs will be returned.
00114          */
00115         list_for_each_entry(tgt, &tbl->mn_targets, mnt_list) {
00116                 int entry_len = sizeof(*entry);
00117 
00118                 if (tgt->mnt_version < version)
00119                         continue;
00120 
00121                 /* write target recover information */
00122                 mti  = &tgt->mnt_mti;
00123                 LASSERT(mti->mti_nid_count < MTI_NIDS_MAX);
00124                 entry_len += mti->mti_nid_count * sizeof(lnet_nid_t);
00125 
00126                 if (entry_len > unit_size) {
00127                         CWARN("nidtbl: too large entry: entry length %d,"
00128                               "unit size: %d\n", entry_len, unit_size);
00129                         GOTO(out, rc = -EOVERFLOW);
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 if (bytes_in_unit < entry_len) {
00133                         if (units_total == 0) {
00134                                 nobuf = true;
00135                                 break;
00136                         }
00137 
00138                         /* check if we need to consume remaining bytes. */
00139                         if (last_in_unit != NULL && bytes_in_unit) {
00140                                 last_in_unit->mne_length += bytes_in_unit;
00141                                 rc  += bytes_in_unit;
00142                                 buf += bytes_in_unit;
00143                                 last_in_unit = NULL;
00144                         }
00145                         LASSERT((rc & (unit_size - 1)) == 0);
00146 
00147                         if (units_in_page == 0) {
00148                                 /* allocate a new page */
00149                                 pages[index] = alloc_page(GFP_KERNEL);
00150                                 if (pages[index] == NULL) {
00151                                         rc = -ENOMEM;
00152                                         break;
00153                                 }
00154 
00155                                 /* destroy previous map */
00156                                 if (index > 0)
00157                                         kunmap(pages[index - 1]);
00158 
00159                                 /* reassign buffer */
00160                                 buf = kmap(pages[index]);
00161                                 ++index;
00162 
00163                                 units_in_page = PAGE_CACHE_SIZE / unit_size;
00164                                 LASSERT(units_in_page > 0);
00165                         }
00166 
00167                         /* allocate an unit */
00168                         LASSERT(((long)buf & (unit_size - 1)) == 0);
00169                         bytes_in_unit = unit_size;
00170                         --units_in_page;
00171                         --units_total;
00172                 }
00173 
00174                 /* fill in entry. */
00175                 entry = (struct mgs_nidtbl_entry *)buf;
00176                 entry->mne_version   = tgt->mnt_version;
00177                 entry->mne_instance  = mti->mti_instance;
00178                 entry->mne_index     = mti->mti_stripe_index;
00179                 entry->mne_length    = entry_len;
00180                 entry->mne_type      = tgt->mnt_type;
00181                 entry->mne_nid_type  = 0;
00182                 entry->mne_nid_size  = sizeof(lnet_nid_t);
00183                 entry->mne_nid_count = mti->mti_nid_count;
00184                 memcpy(entry->u.nids, mti->mti_nids,
00185                        mti->mti_nid_count * sizeof(lnet_nid_t));
00186 
00187                 version = tgt->mnt_version;
00188                 rc     += entry_len;
00189                 buf    += entry_len;
00190 
00191                 bytes_in_unit -= entry_len;
00192                 last_in_unit   = entry;
00193 
00194                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "fsname %s, entry size %d, pages %d/%d/%d/%d.\n",
00195                        tbl->mn_fsdb->fsdb_name, entry_len,
00196                        bytes_in_unit, index, nrpages, units_total);
00197         }
00198         if (index > 0)
00199                 kunmap(pages[index - 1]);
00200 out:
00201         LASSERT(version <= tbl->mn_version);
00202         res->mcr_size = tbl->mn_version;
00203         res->mcr_offset = nobuf ? version : tbl->mn_version;
00204         mutex_unlock(&tbl->mn_lock);
00205         LASSERT(ergo(version == 1, rc == 0)); /* get the log first time */
00206 
00207         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "Read IR logs %s return with %d, version %llu\n",
00208                tbl->mn_fsdb->fsdb_name, rc, version);
00209         RETURN(rc);
00210 }
00211 
00212 static int nidtbl_update_version(const struct lu_env *env,
00213                                  struct mgs_device *mgs,
00214                                  struct mgs_nidtbl *tbl)
00215 {
00216         struct dt_object *fsdb;
00217         struct thandle   *th;
00218         u64               version;
00219         struct lu_buf     buf = {
00220                                 .lb_buf = &version,
00221                                 .lb_len = sizeof(version)
00222                           };
00223         loff_t            off = 0;
00224         int               rc;
00225         ENTRY;
00226 
00227         LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(&tbl->mn_lock));
00228 
00229         fsdb = local_file_find_or_create(env, mgs->mgs_los, mgs->mgs_nidtbl_dir,
00230                                          tbl->mn_fsdb->fsdb_name,
00231                                          S_IFREG | S_IRUGO | S_IWUSR);
00232         if (IS_ERR(fsdb))
00233                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(fsdb));
00234 
00235         th = dt_trans_create(env, mgs->mgs_bottom);
00236         if (IS_ERR(th))
00237                 GOTO(out_put, rc = PTR_ERR(th));
00238 
00239         th->th_sync = 1; /* update table synchronously */
00240         rc = dt_declare_record_write(env, fsdb, &buf, off, th);
00241         if (rc)
00242                 GOTO(out, rc);
00243 
00244         rc = dt_trans_start_local(env, mgs->mgs_bottom, th);
00245         if (rc)
00246                 GOTO(out, rc);
00247 
00248         version = cpu_to_le64(tbl->mn_version);
00249         rc = dt_record_write(env, fsdb, &buf, &off, th);
00250 
00251 out:
00252         dt_trans_stop(env, mgs->mgs_bottom, th);
00253 out_put:
00254         lu_object_put(env, &fsdb->do_lu);
00255         RETURN(rc);
00256 }
00257 
00258 #define MGS_NIDTBL_VERSION_INIT 2
00259 
00260 static int nidtbl_read_version(const struct lu_env *env,
00261                                struct mgs_device *mgs, struct mgs_nidtbl *tbl,
00262                                u64 *version)
00263 {
00264         struct dt_object *fsdb;
00265         struct lu_fid     fid;
00266         u64               tmpver;
00267         struct lu_buf     buf = {
00268                                 .lb_buf = &tmpver,
00269                                 .lb_len = sizeof(tmpver)
00270                           };
00271         loff_t               off = 0;
00272         int                  rc;
00273         ENTRY;
00274 
00275         LASSERT(mutex_is_locked(&tbl->mn_lock));
00276 
00277         LASSERT(mgs->mgs_nidtbl_dir);
00278         rc = dt_lookup_dir(env, mgs->mgs_nidtbl_dir, tbl->mn_fsdb->fsdb_name,
00279                            &fid);
00280         if (rc == -ENOENT) {
00281                 *version = MGS_NIDTBL_VERSION_INIT;
00282                 RETURN(0);
00283         } else if (rc < 0) {
00284                 RETURN(rc);
00285         }
00286 
00287         fsdb = dt_locate_at(env, mgs->mgs_bottom, &fid,
00288                             &mgs->mgs_dt_dev.dd_lu_dev, NULL);
00289         if (IS_ERR(fsdb))
00290                 RETURN(PTR_ERR(fsdb));
00291 
00292         rc = dt_read(env, fsdb, &buf, &off);
00293         if (rc == buf.lb_len) {
00294                 *version = le64_to_cpu(tmpver);
00295                 rc = 0;
00296         } else if (rc == 0) {
00297                 *version = MGS_NIDTBL_VERSION_INIT;
00298         } else {
00299                 CERROR("%s: read version file %s error %d\n",
00300                        mgs->mgs_obd->obd_name, tbl->mn_fsdb->fsdb_name, rc);
00301         }
00302         lu_object_put(env, &fsdb->do_lu);
00303         RETURN(rc);
00304 }
00305 
00306 static int mgs_nidtbl_write(const struct lu_env *env, struct fs_db *fsdb,
00307                             struct mgs_target_info *mti)
00308 {
00309         struct mgs_nidtbl        *tbl;
00310         struct mgs_nidtbl_target *tgt;
00311         bool found = false;
00312         int type   = mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MASK;
00313         int rc     = 0;
00314         ENTRY;
00315 
00316         type &= ~LDD_F_SV_TYPE_MGS;
00317         LASSERT(type != 0);
00318 
00319         tbl = &fsdb->fsdb_nidtbl;
00320         mutex_lock(&tbl->mn_lock);
00321         list_for_each_entry(tgt, &tbl->mn_targets, mnt_list) {
00322                 struct mgs_target_info *info = &tgt->mnt_mti;
00323 
00324                 if (type == tgt->mnt_type &&
00325                     mti->mti_stripe_index == info->mti_stripe_index) {
00326                         found = true;
00327                         break;
00328                 }
00329         }
00330         if (!found) {
00331                 OBD_ALLOC_PTR(tgt);
00332                 if (tgt == NULL)
00333                         GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00334 
00335                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tgt->mnt_list);
00336                 tgt->mnt_fs      = tbl;
00337                 tgt->mnt_version = 0;   /* 0 means invalid */
00338                 tgt->mnt_type    = type;
00339 
00340                 ++tbl->mn_nr_targets;
00341         }
00342 
00343         tgt->mnt_version = ++tbl->mn_version;
00344         tgt->mnt_mti     = *mti;
00345 
00346         list_move_tail(&tgt->mnt_list, &tbl->mn_targets);
00347 
00348         rc = nidtbl_update_version(env, fsdb->fsdb_mgs, tbl);
00349         EXIT;
00350 
00351 out:
00352         mutex_unlock(&tbl->mn_lock);
00353         if (rc)
00354                 CERROR("Write NID table version for file system %s error %d\n",
00355                        fsdb->fsdb_name, rc);
00356         return rc;
00357 }
00358 
00359 static void mgs_nidtbl_fini_fs(struct fs_db *fsdb)
00360 {
00361         struct mgs_nidtbl *tbl = &fsdb->fsdb_nidtbl;
00362         struct list_head head = LIST_HEAD_INIT(head);
00363 
00364         mutex_lock(&tbl->mn_lock);
00365         tbl->mn_nr_targets = 0;
00366         list_splice_init(&tbl->mn_targets, &head);
00367         mutex_unlock(&tbl->mn_lock);
00368 
00369         while (!list_empty(&head)) {
00370                 struct mgs_nidtbl_target *tgt;
00371                 tgt = list_entry(head.next, struct mgs_nidtbl_target, mnt_list);
00372                 list_del(&tgt->mnt_list);
00373                 OBD_FREE_PTR(tgt);
00374         }
00375 }
00376 
00377 static int mgs_nidtbl_init_fs(const struct lu_env *env, struct fs_db *fsdb)
00378 {
00379         struct mgs_nidtbl *tbl = &fsdb->fsdb_nidtbl;
00380         int rc;
00381 
00382         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&tbl->mn_targets);
00383         mutex_init(&tbl->mn_lock);
00384         tbl->mn_nr_targets = 0;
00385         tbl->mn_fsdb = fsdb;
00386         mutex_lock(&tbl->mn_lock);
00387         rc = nidtbl_read_version(env, fsdb->fsdb_mgs, tbl, &tbl->mn_version);
00388         mutex_unlock(&tbl->mn_lock);
00389         if (rc < 0)
00390                 CERROR("%s: IR: failed to read current version, rc = %d\n",
00391                        fsdb->fsdb_mgs->mgs_obd->obd_name, rc);
00392         else
00393                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "IR: current version is %llu\n",
00394                        tbl->mn_version);
00395 
00396         return rc;
00397 }
00398 
00399 /* --------- Imperative Recovery relies on nidtbl stuff ------- */
00400 void mgs_ir_notify_complete(struct fs_db *fsdb)
00401 {
00402         struct timeval tv;
00403         cfs_duration_t delta;
00404 
00405         atomic_set(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_phase, 0);
00406 
00407         /* do statistic */
00408         fsdb->fsdb_notify_count++;
00409         delta = cfs_time_sub(cfs_time_current(), fsdb->fsdb_notify_start);
00410         fsdb->fsdb_notify_total += delta;
00411         if (delta > fsdb->fsdb_notify_max)
00412                 fsdb->fsdb_notify_max = delta;
00413 
00414         cfs_duration_usec(delta, &tv);
00415         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "Revoke recover lock of %s completed after %ld.%06lds\n",
00416                fsdb->fsdb_name, tv.tv_sec, tv.tv_usec);
00417 }
00418 
00419 static int mgs_ir_notify(void *arg)
00420 {
00421         struct fs_db      *fsdb   = arg;
00422         struct ldlm_res_id resid;
00423 
00424         char name[sizeof(fsdb->fsdb_name) + 20];
00425 
00426         LASSERTF(sizeof(name) < 32, "name is too large to be in stack.\n");
00427         sprintf(name, "mgs_%s_notify", fsdb->fsdb_name);
00428 
00429         complete(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_comp);
00430 
00431         set_user_nice(current, -2);
00432 
00433         mgc_fsname2resid(fsdb->fsdb_name, &resid, CONFIG_T_RECOVER);
00434         while (1) {
00435                 struct l_wait_info   lwi = { 0 };
00436 
00437                 l_wait_event(fsdb->fsdb_notify_waitq,
00438                              fsdb->fsdb_notify_stop ||
00439                              atomic_read(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_phase),
00440                              &lwi);
00441                 if (fsdb->fsdb_notify_stop)
00442                         break;
00443 
00444                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "%s woken up, phase is %d\n",
00445                        name, atomic_read(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_phase));
00446 
00447                 fsdb->fsdb_notify_start = cfs_time_current();
00448                 mgs_revoke_lock(fsdb->fsdb_mgs, fsdb, CONFIG_T_RECOVER);
00449         }
00450 
00451         complete(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_comp);
00452         return 0;
00453 }
00454 
00455 int mgs_ir_init_fs(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
00456                    struct fs_db *fsdb)
00457 {
00458         struct task_struct *task;
00459 
00460         if (!ir_timeout)
00461                 ir_timeout = OBD_IR_MGS_TIMEOUT;
00462 
00463         fsdb->fsdb_ir_state = IR_FULL;
00464         if (cfs_time_before(cfs_time_current_sec(),
00465                             mgs->mgs_start_time + ir_timeout))
00466                 fsdb->fsdb_ir_state = IR_STARTUP;
00467         fsdb->fsdb_nonir_clients = 0;
00468         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&fsdb->fsdb_clients);
00469 
00470         /* start notify thread */
00471         fsdb->fsdb_mgs = mgs;
00472         atomic_set(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_phase, 0);
00473         init_waitqueue_head(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_waitq);
00474         init_completion(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_comp);
00475 
00476         task = kthread_run(mgs_ir_notify, fsdb,
00477                                "mgs_%s_notify", fsdb->fsdb_name);
00478         if (!IS_ERR(task))
00479                 wait_for_completion(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_comp);
00480         else
00481                 CERROR("Start notify thread error %ld\n", PTR_ERR(task));
00482 
00483         mgs_nidtbl_init_fs(env, fsdb);
00484         return 0;
00485 }
00486 
00487 void mgs_ir_fini_fs(struct mgs_device *mgs, struct fs_db *fsdb)
00488 {
00489         if (test_bit(FSDB_MGS_SELF, &fsdb->fsdb_flags))
00490                 return;
00491 
00492         mgs_fsc_cleanup_by_fsdb(fsdb);
00493 
00494         mgs_nidtbl_fini_fs(fsdb);
00495 
00496         LASSERT(list_empty(&fsdb->fsdb_clients));
00497 
00498         fsdb->fsdb_notify_stop = 1;
00499         wake_up(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_waitq);
00500         wait_for_completion(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_comp);
00501 }
00502 
00503 /* caller must have held fsdb_mutex */
00504 static inline void ir_state_graduate(struct fs_db *fsdb)
00505 {
00506         if (fsdb->fsdb_ir_state == IR_STARTUP) {
00507                 if (cfs_time_before(fsdb->fsdb_mgs->mgs_start_time + ir_timeout,
00508                                     cfs_time_current_sec())) {
00509                         fsdb->fsdb_ir_state = IR_FULL;
00510                         if (fsdb->fsdb_nonir_clients)
00511                                 fsdb->fsdb_ir_state = IR_PARTIAL;
00512                 }
00513         }
00514 }
00515 
00516 int mgs_ir_update(const struct lu_env *env, struct mgs_device *mgs,
00517                   struct mgs_target_info *mti)
00518 {
00519         struct fs_db *fsdb;
00520         bool notify = true;
00521         int rc;
00522 
00523         if (mti->mti_instance == 0)
00524                 return -EINVAL;
00525 
00526         rc = mgs_find_or_make_fsdb(env, mgs, mti->mti_fsname, &fsdb);
00527         if (rc)
00528                 return rc;
00529 
00530         rc = mgs_nidtbl_write(env, fsdb, mti);
00531         if (rc)
00532                 return rc;
00533 
00534         /* check ir state */
00535         mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00536         ir_state_graduate(fsdb);
00537         switch (fsdb->fsdb_ir_state) {
00538         case IR_FULL:
00539                 mti->mti_flags |= LDD_F_IR_CAPABLE;
00540                 break;
00541         case IR_DISABLED:
00542                 notify = false;
00543         case IR_STARTUP:
00544         case IR_PARTIAL:
00545                 break;
00546         default:
00547                 LBUG();
00548         }
00549         mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00550 
00551         LASSERT(ergo(mti->mti_flags & LDD_F_IR_CAPABLE, notify));
00552         if (notify) {
00553                 CDEBUG(D_MGS, "Try to revoke recover lock of %s\n",
00554                        fsdb->fsdb_name);
00555                 atomic_inc(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_phase);
00556                 wake_up(&fsdb->fsdb_notify_waitq);
00557         }
00558         return 0;
00559 }
00560 
00561 /* NID table can be cached by two entities: Clients and MDTs */
00562 enum {
00563         IR_CLIENT  = 1,
00564         IR_MDT     = 2
00565 };
00566 
00567 static int delogname(char *logname, char *fsname, int *typ)
00568 {
00569         char *ptr;
00570         int   type;
00571         int   len;
00572 
00573         ptr = strrchr(logname, '-');
00574         if (ptr == NULL)
00575                 return -EINVAL;
00576 
00577         /* decouple file system name. The llog name may be:
00578          * - "prefix-fsname", prefix is "cliir" or "mdtir"
00579          */
00580         if (strncmp(ptr, "-mdtir", 6) == 0)
00581                 type = IR_MDT;
00582         else if (strncmp(ptr, "-cliir", 6) == 0)
00583                 type = IR_CLIENT;
00584         else
00585                 return -EINVAL;
00586 
00587         len = ptr - logname;
00588         if (len == 0)
00589                 return -EINVAL;
00590 
00591         memcpy(fsname, logname, len);
00592         fsname[len] = 0;
00593         if (typ)
00594                 *typ = type;
00595         return 0;
00596 }
00597 
00598 int mgs_get_ir_logs(struct ptlrpc_request *req)
00599 {
00600         struct lu_env     *env = req->rq_svc_thread->t_env;
00601         struct mgs_device *mgs = exp2mgs_dev(req->rq_export);
00602         struct fs_db      *fsdb;
00603         struct mgs_config_body  *body;
00604         struct mgs_config_res   *res;
00605         struct ptlrpc_bulk_desc *desc;
00606         struct l_wait_info lwi;
00607         char               fsname[16];
00608         long               bufsize;
00609         int                unit_size;
00610         int                type;
00611         int                rc = 0;
00612         int                i;
00613         int                bytes;
00614         int                page_count;
00615         int                nrpages;
00616         struct page       **pages = NULL;
00617         ENTRY;
00618 
00619         body = req_capsule_client_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_MGS_CONFIG_BODY);
00620         if (body == NULL)
00621                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00622 
00623         if (body->mcb_type != CONFIG_T_RECOVER)
00624                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00625 
00626         rc = delogname(body->mcb_name, fsname, &type);
00627         if (rc)
00628                 RETURN(rc);
00629 
00630         rc = mgs_find_or_make_fsdb(env, mgs, fsname, &fsdb);
00631         if (rc)
00632                 RETURN(rc);
00633 
00634         bufsize = body->mcb_units << body->mcb_bits;
00635         nrpages = (bufsize + PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1) >> PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00636         if (nrpages > PTLRPC_MAX_BRW_PAGES)
00637                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
00638 
00639         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "Reading IR log %s bufsize %ld.\n",
00640                body->mcb_name, bufsize);
00641 
00642         OBD_ALLOC(pages, sizeof(*pages) * nrpages);
00643         if (pages == NULL)
00644                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00645 
00646         res = req_capsule_server_get(&req->rq_pill, &RMF_MGS_CONFIG_RES);
00647         if (res == NULL)
00648                 GOTO(out, rc = -EINVAL);
00649 
00650         res->mcr_offset = body->mcb_offset;
00651         unit_size = min_t(int, 1 << body->mcb_bits, PAGE_CACHE_SIZE);
00652         bytes = mgs_nidtbl_read(req->rq_export, &fsdb->fsdb_nidtbl, res,
00653                                 pages, nrpages, bufsize / unit_size, unit_size);
00654         if (bytes < 0)
00655                 GOTO(out, rc = bytes);
00656 
00657         /* start bulk transfer */
00658         page_count = (bytes + PAGE_CACHE_SIZE - 1) >> PAGE_CACHE_SHIFT;
00659         LASSERT(page_count <= nrpages);
00660         desc = ptlrpc_prep_bulk_exp(req, page_count, 1,
00661                                     PTLRPC_BULK_PUT_SOURCE |
00662                                         PTLRPC_BULK_BUF_KIOV,
00663                                     MGS_BULK_PORTAL,
00664                                     &ptlrpc_bulk_kiov_pin_ops);
00665         if (desc == NULL)
00666                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00667 
00668         for (i = 0; i < page_count && bytes > 0; i++) {
00669                 desc->bd_frag_ops->add_kiov_frag(desc, pages[i], 0,
00670                                                  min_t(int, bytes,
00671                                                       PAGE_CACHE_SIZE));
00672                 bytes -= PAGE_CACHE_SIZE;
00673         }
00674 
00675         rc = target_bulk_io(req->rq_export, desc, &lwi);
00676         ptlrpc_free_bulk(desc);
00677 
00678 out:
00679         for (i = 0; i < nrpages; i++) {
00680                 if (pages[i] == NULL)
00681                         break;
00682                 __free_page(pages[i]);
00683         }
00684         OBD_FREE(pages, sizeof(*pages) * nrpages);
00685         return rc;
00686 }
00687 
00688 static int lprocfs_ir_set_state(struct fs_db *fsdb, const char *buf)
00689 {
00690         const char *strings[] = IR_STRINGS;
00691         int         state = -1;
00692         int         i;
00693 
00694         for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(strings); i++) {
00695                 if (strcmp(strings[i], buf) == 0) {
00696                         state = i;
00697                         break;
00698                 }
00699         }
00700         if (state < 0)
00701                 return -EINVAL;
00702 
00703         CDEBUG(D_MGS, "change fsr state of %s from %s to %s\n",
00704                fsdb->fsdb_name, strings[fsdb->fsdb_ir_state], strings[state]);
00705         mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00706         if (state == IR_FULL && fsdb->fsdb_nonir_clients)
00707                 state = IR_PARTIAL;
00708         fsdb->fsdb_ir_state = state;
00709         mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00710 
00711         return 0;
00712 }
00713 
00714 static int lprocfs_ir_set_timeout(struct fs_db *fsdb, const char *buf)
00715 {
00716         return -EINVAL;
00717 }
00718 
00719 static int lprocfs_ir_clear_stats(struct fs_db *fsdb, const char *buf)
00720 {
00721         if (*buf)
00722                 return -EINVAL;
00723 
00724         fsdb->fsdb_notify_total = 0;
00725         fsdb->fsdb_notify_max   = 0;
00726         fsdb->fsdb_notify_count = 0;
00727         return 0;
00728 }
00729 
00730 static struct lproc_ir_cmd {
00731         char *name;
00732         int   namelen;
00733         int (*handler)(struct fs_db *, const char *);
00734 } ir_cmds[] = {
00735         { "state=",   6, lprocfs_ir_set_state },
00736         { "timeout=", 8, lprocfs_ir_set_timeout },
00737         { "0",        1, lprocfs_ir_clear_stats }
00738 };
00739 
00740 int lprocfs_wr_ir_state(struct file *file, const char __user *buffer,
00741                         size_t count, void *data)
00742 {
00743         struct fs_db *fsdb = data;
00744         char *kbuf;
00745         char *ptr;
00746         int rc = 0;
00747 
00748         if (count == 0 || count >= PAGE_CACHE_SIZE)
00749                 return -EINVAL;
00750 
00751         OBD_ALLOC(kbuf, count + 1);
00752         if (kbuf == NULL)
00753                 return -ENOMEM;
00754 
00755         if (copy_from_user(kbuf, buffer, count)) {
00756                 OBD_FREE(kbuf, count + 1);
00757                 return -EFAULT;
00758         }
00759 
00760         kbuf[count] = 0; /* buffer is supposed to end with 0 */
00761         if (kbuf[count - 1] == '\n')
00762                 kbuf[count - 1] = 0;
00763         ptr = kbuf;
00764 
00765         /* fsname=<file system name> must be the 1st entry */
00766         while (ptr != NULL) {
00767                 char *tmpptr;
00768                 int i;
00769 
00770                 tmpptr = strchr(ptr, ';');
00771                 if (tmpptr)
00772                         *tmpptr++ = 0;
00773 
00774                 rc = -EINVAL;
00775                 for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(ir_cmds); i++) {
00776                         struct lproc_ir_cmd *cmd;
00777                         int cmdlen;
00778 
00779                         cmd    = &ir_cmds[i];
00780                         cmdlen = cmd->namelen;
00781                         if (strncmp(cmd->name, ptr, cmdlen) == 0) {
00782                                 ptr += cmdlen;
00783                                 rc = cmd->handler(fsdb, ptr);
00784                                 break;
00785                         }
00786                 }
00787                 if (rc)
00788                         break;
00789 
00790                 ptr = tmpptr;
00791         }
00792         if (rc)
00793                 CERROR("Unable to process command: %s(%d)\n", ptr, rc);
00794         OBD_FREE(kbuf, count + 1);
00795         return rc ?: count;
00796 }
00797 
00798 int lprocfs_rd_ir_state(struct seq_file *seq, void *data)
00799 {
00800         struct fs_db      *fsdb = data;
00801         struct mgs_nidtbl *tbl  = &fsdb->fsdb_nidtbl;
00802         const char        *ir_strings[] = IR_STRINGS;
00803         struct timeval     tv_max;
00804         struct timeval     tv;
00805 
00806         /* mgs_live_seq_show() already holds fsdb_mutex. */
00807         ir_state_graduate(fsdb);
00808 
00809         seq_printf(seq, "\nimperative_recovery_state:\n");
00810         seq_printf(seq,
00811                    "    state: %s\n"
00812                    "    nonir_clients: %d\n"
00813                    "    nidtbl_version: %lld\n",
00814                    ir_strings[fsdb->fsdb_ir_state], fsdb->fsdb_nonir_clients,
00815                    tbl->mn_version);
00816 
00817         cfs_duration_usec(fsdb->fsdb_notify_total, &tv);
00818         cfs_duration_usec(fsdb->fsdb_notify_max, &tv_max);
00819 
00820         seq_printf(seq, "    notify_duration_total: %lu.%06lu\n"
00821                         "    notify_duation_max: %lu.%06lu\n"
00822                         "    notify_count: %u\n",
00823                    tv.tv_sec, tv.tv_usec,
00824                    tv_max.tv_sec, tv_max.tv_usec,
00825                    fsdb->fsdb_notify_count);
00826 
00827         return 0;
00828 }
00829 
00830 int lprocfs_ir_timeout_seq_show(struct seq_file *m, void *data)
00831 {
00832         return lprocfs_uint_seq_show(m, &ir_timeout);
00833 }
00834 
00835 ssize_t lprocfs_ir_timeout_seq_write(struct file *file,
00836                                      const char __user *buffer,
00837                                      size_t count, loff_t *off)
00838 {
00839         return lprocfs_wr_uint(file, buffer, count, &ir_timeout);
00840 }
00841 
00842 /* --------------- Handle non IR support clients --------------- */
00843 /* attach a lustre file system to an export */
00844 int mgs_fsc_attach(const struct lu_env *env, struct obd_export *exp,
00845                    char *fsname)
00846 {
00847         struct mgs_export_data *data = &exp->u.eu_mgs_data;
00848         struct mgs_device *mgs = exp2mgs_dev(exp);
00849         struct fs_db      *fsdb;
00850         struct mgs_fsc    *fsc     = NULL;
00851         struct mgs_fsc    *new_fsc = NULL;
00852         bool               found   = false;
00853         int                rc;
00854         ENTRY;
00855 
00856         rc = mgs_find_or_make_fsdb(env, mgs, fsname, &fsdb);
00857         if (rc)
00858                 RETURN(rc);
00859 
00860         /* allocate a new fsc in case we need it in spinlock. */
00861         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(new_fsc);
00862         if (new_fsc == NULL)
00863                 RETURN(-ENOMEM);
00864 
00865         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&new_fsc->mfc_export_list);
00866         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&new_fsc->mfc_fsdb_list);
00867         new_fsc->mfc_fsdb       = fsdb;
00868         new_fsc->mfc_export     = class_export_get(exp);
00869         new_fsc->mfc_ir_capable = !!(exp_connect_flags(exp) &
00870                                      OBD_CONNECT_IMP_RECOV);
00871 
00872         rc = -EEXIST;
00873         mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00874 
00875         /* tend to find it in export list because this list is shorter. */
00876         spin_lock(&data->med_lock);
00877         list_for_each_entry(fsc, &data->med_clients, mfc_export_list) {
00878                 if (strcmp(fsname, fsc->mfc_fsdb->fsdb_name) == 0) {
00879                         found = true;
00880                         break;
00881                 }
00882         }
00883         if (!found) {
00884                 fsc = new_fsc;
00885                 new_fsc = NULL;
00886 
00887                 /* add it into export list. */
00888                 list_add(&fsc->mfc_export_list, &data->med_clients);
00889 
00890                 /* add into fsdb list. */
00891                 list_add(&fsc->mfc_fsdb_list, &fsdb->fsdb_clients);
00892                 if (!fsc->mfc_ir_capable) {
00893                         ++fsdb->fsdb_nonir_clients;
00894                         if (fsdb->fsdb_ir_state == IR_FULL)
00895                                 fsdb->fsdb_ir_state = IR_PARTIAL;
00896                 }
00897                 rc = 0;
00898         }
00899         spin_unlock(&data->med_lock);
00900         mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00901 
00902         if (new_fsc) {
00903                 class_export_put(new_fsc->mfc_export);
00904                 OBD_FREE_PTR(new_fsc);
00905         }
00906         RETURN(rc);
00907 }
00908 
00909 void mgs_fsc_cleanup(struct obd_export *exp)
00910 {
00911         struct mgs_export_data *data = &exp->u.eu_mgs_data;
00912         struct mgs_fsc *fsc, *tmp;
00913         struct list_head head = LIST_HEAD_INIT(head);
00914 
00915         spin_lock(&data->med_lock);
00916         list_splice_init(&data->med_clients, &head);
00917         spin_unlock(&data->med_lock);
00918 
00919         list_for_each_entry_safe(fsc, tmp, &head, mfc_export_list) {
00920                 struct fs_db *fsdb = fsc->mfc_fsdb;
00921 
00922                 LASSERT(fsc->mfc_export == exp);
00923 
00924                 mutex_lock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00925                 list_del_init(&fsc->mfc_fsdb_list);
00926                 if (fsc->mfc_ir_capable == 0) {
00927                         --fsdb->fsdb_nonir_clients;
00928                         LASSERT(fsdb->fsdb_ir_state != IR_FULL);
00929                         if (fsdb->fsdb_nonir_clients == 0 &&
00930                             fsdb->fsdb_ir_state == IR_PARTIAL)
00931                                 fsdb->fsdb_ir_state = IR_FULL;
00932                 }
00933                 mutex_unlock(&fsdb->fsdb_mutex);
00934                 list_del_init(&fsc->mfc_export_list);
00935                 class_export_put(fsc->mfc_export);
00936                 OBD_FREE_PTR(fsc);
00937         }
00938 }
00939 
00940 /* must be called with fsdb->fsdb_mutex held */
00941 void mgs_fsc_cleanup_by_fsdb(struct fs_db *fsdb)
00942 {
00943         struct mgs_fsc *fsc, *tmp;
00944 
00945         list_for_each_entry_safe(fsc, tmp, &fsdb->fsdb_clients,
00946                                      mfc_fsdb_list) {
00947                 struct mgs_export_data *data = &fsc->mfc_export->u.eu_mgs_data;
00948 
00949                 LASSERT(fsdb == fsc->mfc_fsdb);
00950                 list_del_init(&fsc->mfc_fsdb_list);
00951 
00952                 spin_lock(&data->med_lock);
00953                 list_del_init(&fsc->mfc_export_list);
00954                 spin_unlock(&data->med_lock);
00955                 class_export_put(fsc->mfc_export);
00956                 OBD_FREE_PTR(fsc);
00957         }
00958 
00959         fsdb->fsdb_nonir_clients = 0;
00960         if (fsdb->fsdb_ir_state == IR_PARTIAL)
00961                 fsdb->fsdb_ir_state = IR_FULL;
00962 }
